titleStmt.title: The sun out-shining the moon, or, Righteousness excelling rottennness in answer to a lying scandalous paper, published by John Moone, entituled, The true light hath made manifest darknesse, &c. : but it is darkness put forth for light, as it will appear by that which followeth / and is published by John Price.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Welsh clergyman.
Bownd, William. Brief discovery of the the erroneous tenets of those who are distinguished from other men by the name of Quakers.

notesStmt.note: Includes "Here followeth under the same title, a brief discovery of the erroneous tenets of those who are distinguished from other men by the name of Quakers, namely John Moone, & Alexander Parker, and others ... by ... William Bownd -- p. 25-43.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
